Address: 5775 MOREHOUSE DR, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States of America
Industry: Radio And Television Broadcasting And Communications Equipment
CompanyDescription: We incorporated in California in 1985 and reincorporated in Delaware in 1991. We operate and report using a 52-53 week fiscal year ending on the last Sunday in September. Our 52-week fiscal years consist of four equal fiscal quarters of 13 weeks each, and our 53-week fiscal years consist of three 13-week fiscal quarters and one 14-week fiscal quarter. The financial results for our 53-week fiscal years and our 14-week fiscal quarters will not be exactly comparable to our 52-week fiscal years and our 13-week fiscal quarters. The fiscal years ended September 29, 2019 and September 24, 2017 included 52 weeks. The fiscal year ended September 30, 2018 included 53 weeks. Overview We are a global leader in the development and commercialization of foundational technologies for the wireless industry.  ... More ...
